headline: 2025-10-27 — Authors of the arXiv power-interactions paper demonstrated control on 1 RLC circuit (1 circuit) as an illustrative case using a controllable voltage source (evidence: “we utilize a simple RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source for illustrations”)

2025-10-28 — Authors of the arXiv power-interactions paper published a 2-layer distributed output feedback control design (higher layer + lower layer = 2 layers) that sets reference points between layers (evidence: “higher layer design … becomes a control command to the lower layer physical model”)

2025-10-29 — Authors of the arXiv correction note published an explicit correction identifying 1 serious mistake in Olfati‑Saber, Fax, and Murray (Proceedings of the IEEE, Vol.95, 2007) (evidence: “This note corrects a pretty serious mistake … published in Vol. 95 of the Proceedings of the IEEE (2007, No. 1, P. 215-233)”)

2025-10-30 — Authors of the arXiv correction note addressed 1 priority-interpretation issue and stated they include several stronger results applicable to the problem class (evidence: “It also mentions several stronger results … and addresses the issue of priority whose interpretation … is not exact”)
